And <S%G2532><s%> she being <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5723><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> child <S%G1064><s%> cried <S%G2896><s%> <S%G5719><s%>, travailing in birth <S%G5605><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> pained <S%G928><s%> <S%G5746><s%> to be delivered <S%G5088><s%> <S%G5629><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> there appeared <S%G3700><s%> <S%G5681><s%> another <S%G243><s%> wonder <S%G4592><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> behold <S%G2400><s%> <S%G5628><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> red <S%G4450><s%> dragon <S%G1404><s%>, having <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5723><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> heads <S%G2776><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> ten <S%G1176><s%> shofars <S%G2768><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> crowns <S%G1238><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> his <S%G846><s%> heads <S%G2776><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> tail <S%G3769><s%> drew <S%G4951><s%> <S%G5719><s%> the third part <S%G5154><s%> of the stars <S%G792><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> did cast <S%G906><s%> <S%G5627><s%> them <S%G846><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> the dragon <S%G1404><s%> stood <S%G2476><s%> <S%G5707><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> the woman <S%G1135><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> was ready <S%G3195><s%> <S%G5723><s%> to be delivered <S%G5088><s%> <S%G5629><s%>, for <S%G2443><s%> to devour <S%G2719><s%> <S%G5632><s%> her <S%G846><s%> child <S%G5043><s%> as soon as <S%G3752><s%> it was born <S%G5088><s%> <S%G5632><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> she brought forth <S%G5088><s%> <S%G5627><s%> a man <S%G730><s%> child <S%G5207><s%>, who <S%G3739><s%> was <S%G3195><s%> <S%G5719><s%> to rule <S%G4165><s%> <S%G5721><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> nations <S%G1484><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> a rod <S%G4464><s%> of iron <S%G4603><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> her <S%G846><s%> child <S%G5043><s%> was caught up <S%G726><s%> <S%G5681><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to his <S%G846><s%> throne <S%G2362><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the woman <S%G1135><s%> fled <S%G5343><s%> <S%G5627><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the wilderness <S%G2048><s%>, where <S%G3699><s%> she hath <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5719><s%> a place <S%G5117><s%> prepared <S%G2090><s%> <S%G5772><s%> of <S%G575><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> they should feed <S%G5142><s%> <S%G5725><s%> her <S%G846><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> a thousand <S%G5507><s%> two hundred <S%G1250><s%> and threescore <S%G1835><s%> days <S%G2250><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> there was <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5633><s%> war <S%G4171><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>: Mikha'el <S%G3413><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> fought <S%G4170><s%> <S%G5656><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> the dragon <S%G1404><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> the dragon <S%G1404><s%> fought <S%G4170><s%> <S%G5656><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> angels <S%G32><s%>,

And <S%G2532><s%> prevailed <S%G2480><s%> <S%G5656><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>; neither <S%G3777><s%> was <S%G2147><s%> their <S%G846><s%> place <S%G5117><s%> found <S%G2147><s%> <S%G5681><s%> any more <S%G2089><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the great <S%G3173><s%> dragon <S%G1404><s%> was cast out <S%G906><s%> <S%G5681><s%>, that old <S%G744><s%> serpent <S%G3789><s%>, called <S%G2564><s%> <S%G5746><s%> the Devil <S%G1228><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> deceiveth <S%G4105><s%> <S%G5723><s%> the whole <S%G3650><s%> world <S%G3625><s%>: he was cast out <S%G906><s%> <S%G5681><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> were cast out <S%G906><s%> <S%G5681><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I heard <S%G191><s%> <S%G5656><s%> a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5723><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>, Now <S%G737><s%> is come <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5633><s%> salvation <S%G4991><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> strength <S%G1411><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the power <S%G1849><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%>: for <S%G3754><s%> the accuser <S%G2723><s%> <S%G5723><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%> is cast down <S%G2598><s%> <S%G5681><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> accused <S%G2725><s%> them <S%G846><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> night <S%G3571><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G846><s%> overcame <S%G3528><s%> <S%G5656><s%> him <S%G846><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the blood <S%G129><s%> of the Lamb <S%G721><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of their <S%G846><s%> testimony <S%G3141><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> they loved <S%G25><s%> <S%G5656><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> their <S%G846><s%> lives <S%G5590><s%> unto <S%G891><s%> the death <S%G2288><s%>.

Therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> rejoice <S%G2165><s%> <S%G5744><s%>, ye heavens <S%G3772><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> ye that dwell <S%G4637><s%> <S%G5723><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> them <S%G846><s%>. Woe <S%G3759><s%> to the inhabiters <S%G2730><s%> <S%G5723><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of the sea <S%G2281><s%>! for <S%G3754><s%> the devil <S%G1228><s%> is come down <S%G2597><s%> <S%G5627><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>, having <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5723><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> wrath <S%G2372><s%>, because he knoweth <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5761><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he hath <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5719><s%> but a short <S%G3641><s%> time <S%G2540><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> the dragon <S%G1404><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5627><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he was cast <S%G906><s%> <S%G5681><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%>, he persecuted <S%G1377><s%> <S%G5656><s%> the woman <S%G1135><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> brought forth <S%G5088><s%> <S%G5627><s%> the man <S%G730><s%> child.

And <S%G2532><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%> helped <S%G997><s%> <S%G5656><s%> the woman <S%G1135><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%> opened <S%G455><s%> <S%G5656><s%> her <S%G846><s%> mouth <S%G4750><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> swallowed up <S%G2666><s%> <S%G5627><s%> the flood <S%G4215><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> the dragon <S%G1404><s%> cast <S%G906><s%> <S%G5627><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> his <S%G846><s%> mouth <S%G4750><s%>.
